document.full_text: rod blagojevich's onetime top aide testified on tuesday that he was asked by the disgraced former illinois governor how much barack obama's vacant u.s. senate seat might be worth.
document.title: rod blagojevich aide testifies about ex-governor's greed
lines_and_colors: rod blagojevich's onetime top aide testified on tuesday that he was asked by the disgraced former illinois governor how much barack obama's vacant u.s. senate seat might be worth.
